item.title: We fear what we don't know!
item.description: You might all know, that there was an era when people do shitty ceremonies to praise their gods like sacrificing and all. And you must be thinking, only a fool can think so. Then you are wrong, everyone including you and me, are fool enough to do same shitty things when it comes to thing that we don’t understand. Confused? Well, it’s not any theory, but one thing that I believe might be the reason.
